name: Ninetales
flavorText:
Very smart and
very vengeful.
Grabbing one of its many tails
could result in a
1000-year curse.

previous.name: Vulpix
previous.flavorText:
At the time of
birth, it has
just one tail. The tail splits
from its tip as
it grows older.

next.name: Jigglypuff
next.flavorText:
When its huge eyes
light up, it sings
a mysteriously soothing melody
that lulls its
enemies to sleep.

pokemon.name: Vulpix

birth, it has
just one tail. The tail splits
from its tip as
it grows older.
